settings.search.matchFilter.levels.0:
Filtering is disabled and results will not be restricted.
Up level to hide irrelevant content from matches.

settings.search.matchFilter.levels.stric: Filter is set to strict mode.
settings.search.matchFilter.levels.warni: Searches may return results, but will probably not pass the filter. Reduce the level so that relevant content is not filtered out.
